concept.title: Implement customer attributes
concept.shortdesc: Learn how to start using the customer attributes.

section.title: Implement Customer Attributes
section.p: The recommended implementation is to use the latest Marketing Cloud ID service. (Alternatively, you can populate the customer ID into a prop or eVar.)
section.note: If you implemented Marketing Cloud Audiences, you have already implemented Customer Attributes.
section.p: To simplify the implementation of the MAC ID service, you can use dynamic tag management. If you use dynamic tag management, a temporary work-around is required if you need to configure custom settings for sequencing. (See Dynamic Tag Management MACID Custom Settings.)
Required code versions for this feature:
Use code from production in Admin Tools > Code Manager in Analytics.

section.title: Synching the Customer ID with your Analytics Implementation
section.p: When a visitor authenticates on your website or otherwise identifies himself, you must expose that person's CRM customer ID to your Analytics implementation. This synchronization stores that visitor's CRM customer ID in the Marketing Cloud, and activates that customer's attributes for use in the Marketing Cloud.

For example, assume that Bob has Customer ID 52mc210tr42 in your CRM system. When Bob authenticates on your site, you must expose this ID on the page, and use the ID to synchronize it by one of two means:

ul.li:
Call visitor.setCustomerIDs({"crm_id":"52mc210tr42"}) using the Visitor ID service.
Or,
Populate the Customer ID (52mc210tr42) in a prop or eVar.

section.p: The Customer ID must be set on each Analytics server call where the Customer ID is known.

Customer attribute data is made available in Analytics after visitors log in. If you have not yet implemented the latest visitor ID service, and if you have historically been tracking customer IDs in a prop or eVar, you can request a process that sends historical logins to the Marketing Cloud. This process lets you begin using customer attributes immediately.
Contact Customer Care to enable this feature.
